ygData.subject: Re: Halo of Light spell
ygData.msgSnippet: Also, the spell is in the 6 plat range for me to purchase.  I don t have the exact amount written down on this one, but the rest in that level that I have
ygData.messageBody:
Also, the spell is in the 6 plat range for me to purchase. I don't have
the exact amount written down on this one, but the rest in that level that
I have purchased have been over 6 1/2 plat, most being 6p 7g 5s. Just so
you know and can be prepared :)


At 07:55 PM 5/11/99 -0700, you wrote:
>From: Cristie <cristie@...>
>
>It can be found in Neriak, I have purchased the spell and use it
>myself. I play on the Veeshan server, if you are on the same feel free to
>send a message to me and I will gladly purchase the spell for you and meet
>you somewhere.
>
>Alaia, Dark Elf Wiz, Veeshan
>
>
>
